title: Born to Be Together
overview: Due to a case of mistaken identity at a cooperation signing reception, two people mistakenly brought home two children who were supposed to be twins. As it turns out, the cuties are the best "wingman" for the job so that their amnesiac parents, who have "long been separated", can finally reunite. This tells a story about an amusing romance between a well-known children's clothing designer and the proud and cold-faced executive.Â
